类的使用
cardgame.Chessboard

  • cardgame中Chessboard的使用

    参数类型为Chessboard的cardgame中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    int EasyComputer.choose​(Chessboard chessboard)  
    int HardComputer.choose​(Chessboard chessboard)
    The computer choose the strategy it will use.
    int Strategy.choose​(Chessboard chessboard)
    The method of choosing the strategy.
    abstract void Play.MoveCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    Method of moving the card.
    void PlayerReal.MoveCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    It's the method how the real player move the card.
    void PlayerVirtual.MoveCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    It's the method how the computer move the card.
    abstract void Play.PlayCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    Method of putting the card in the chess board.
    void PlayerReal.PlayCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    It is the method how the real player put the card in the chess board.
    void PlayerVirtual.PlayCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
    It is the method how the computer put the card in the chess board.
    void PlayerVirtual.RobotPlay​(Chessboard chessboard, Deck deck)
    We have three ways to play the turn, so the computer also has three ways to play the turn.
